ingredients.ingredient: 3 (7.5 ounce) cans refrigerated biscuit dough (such as Pillsbury® Country Style)
½ teaspoon ground cinnamon, or to taste

cookingTips: Melt margarine and combine with cream and brown sugar for the caramel layer
Bake at 350°F for 25-30 minutes, then immediately invert onto a serving plate so caramel drips down
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Would you like to brush the biscuits with cinnamon sugar for extra flavor before assembling?
